page.title: 18HAIRDRESSING IN TIMSBURY
page.content: Yesterday,Claire and I (Laura) visited a local unisex hairdressing salon.It is on a busy road,and it is run by two girls.We were pleased with our results. Perms are the most popular hair-style in 1985 because it suits a lot of people.The hairdressers do not have to do many punk hairstyles.We are glad about this.They get a lot of customers and make a good living. Having another salon nearby isn't a problem.They buy a lot of their accessories from 'reps'who visit weekly.The most popular hair- styles of 1985 which Claire and I like are permed hair and long hair.Short hair-styles are very popular,but you have to have the style which suits you. {By Claire and Laura. {
